rows.label: qst101415_msg0001
rows.name:
You've taken care of
the Rampaging Sauros?!

rows.label: qst101415_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't tell you how
happy I am to hear that!

rows.label: qst101415_msg0003
rows.name:
Seriously, I don't know
how to thank you enough.

rows.label: qst101415_msg0004
rows.name:
Would you mind telling me exactly
where you found them all?

rows.label: qst101415_msg0006
rows.name:
At the very least, I expect the
Volff won't be too keen to return
to where their comrades fell.

rows.label: qst101415_msg0007
rows.name:
And since you've taken care of
the Rampaging Sauros, the threat
to the area should have passed.

rows.label: qst101415_msg0008
rows.name:
I think I'll go and pay my
respects to my fallen friends.

rows.label: qst101415_msg0009
rows.name:
That, and I'd like to have
something I could pass on
to their families...

rows.label: qst101415_msg0010
rows.name:
Thank you once again
for your cooperation!
